title: Hour 2: New York Win It?
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Chris "Mad Dog" Russo, and Brian Windhorst get right into debating what kind of season the Brooklyn Nets will have now that Kevin Durant has agreed to move forward with the team. Plus, Dana White spilled some hot tea that Tom Brady was almost a Raider in 2020, so Stephen A. and Mad Dog debate if this puts more pressure on Derek Carr this season. After the Yankees swept the Mets this week, the crew argues which New York team is the bigger threat when it comes to a World Series push. How about them Cowboys?? Dak Prescott is optimistic about this year's team, but does Kimberly A. Martin share his positive outlook? Stephen A. and the crew get ready to enter Cowboys country as they take the show on the road tomorrow.

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Who's the bigger World Series threat: the Yankees or the Mets?
